comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: Similar picture (with soldiers) from Corbis. Given date of February 9, 1913. www.corbisimages.com/Enlargement/BE071520.html The Corbis picture was published in Mexico, the Land of Unrest www.archive.org/stream/mexicolandofunre00baerrich#page/n4... Thanks to Rob Ketcherside for that pointer -- on www.flickr.com/groups/flickrcommons/discuss/7215761183597...
